TYPE.description: the type of event on the platform, i.e. subscription

ID.description: a unique id GUID for this event instance, i.e. baa1dfda864791479bc70d0403f34ec2

VALUETYPE.description: which grouping the event is of: money, follow, viewer

VALUE.description: the standardised value of the event. Donations and money amounts are converted to USD with 2 decimal digits for cents if needed. Subscriptions have the USD cost of them. Follows and Hosts have the viewer count.

CALCVALUE.description: Action only - an optional calculated value generated by the manipulator script that is only available in the action script.

BESTNAME.description: the best name for the user the event was done for. This will be the display name if one is available, otherwise the username.

BESTCOMMENT.description: the best comment/message attached to the event. Will be a blank string if no comment/message exists on the event

name.description: the display name of the user who did the event

amount.description: the amount of the donation with a variable (0-10) number of decimal places

formatted_amount.description: the amount as 2 decimal places and the currancy symbol

message.description: the text message with the donation

currency.description: the 3 letter currance code, i.e. USD, GBP

patreon-pledge._comment: There isn't a currency type provided in streamlabs API any more, so this won't be converted to USD. Use with caution as amount will be in *some* currency.

name.description: the username of the person who did the event

formatted_amount.description: the amount as 2 decimal places and the currancy symbol

amount.description: the amount of the donation with a variable (0-10) number of decimal places

twitch_account-subscription._comment: When a user gets themselves a subscription

name.description: the username of the person who did the event

display_name.description: the display name of the person who did the event

months.description: number of months this user has been subscribed for in a row

message.description: the text message with the subscription

sub_plan.description: the number twitch uses to identify each sub tier: Prime, 1000, 2000, 3000

twitch_account-subscriptionGift._comment: When a user is gifted a subscription. If the gift was too the community and not the specific viewer then the 'twitchMysterSubGiftMode' option must be set to 'receiver' in the profile for this event to be triggered in this situation.

name.description: the username of the person who received the subscription

display_name.description: the display name of the person who received the subscription

months.description: number of months this user has been subscribed for in a row

message.description: the text message with the subscription

sub_plan.description: the number twitch uses to identify each sub tier: Prime, 1000, 2000, 3000

gifter.description: the username of the person who gifted the subscription

twitch_account-subMysteryGift._comment: When a user gifts a number of subscriptions to the community. The 'twitchMysterSubGiftMode' option must be set to 'donator' in the profile for this event to be triggered.

name.description: the username of the person who did the event

gifter.description: the username of the person who gifted the subscription

gifter_display_name.description: the display name of the person who gifted the subscription

amount.description: the number of subscriptions gifted to the community

sub_plan.description: the number twitch uses to identify each sub tier: Prime, 1000, 2000, 3000

name.description: the username of the person who did the event

display_name.description: the display name of the person who did the event

message.description: the text message with the bits

name.description: the username of the person who did the event

twitch_account-host.WARNING: NOT UPDATED WITH OTHER TWITCH CHANGES AS NO SAMPLE DATA: 2021-04-09

name.description: the username of the person who did the event

viewers.description: number of viewers of the host

raiders.description: number of viewers of the raid

displayString.description: the amount as 2 decimal places and the currancy symbol

comment.description: the text message with the donation
